document.heading: Truth in Affordability Reporting Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-199, the “Truth in Affordability Reporting Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-369. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 8, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-493 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-199 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
